meanings.sent1: The dark, disquieting forest made me feel nervous.
meanings.sent2: The disquieting news about the storm approaching worried everyone.
meanings.sent3: His disquieting habit of always checking the locks before bed became a running joke in the family.
meanings.sent4: The disquieting silence in the empty house felt like a heavy weight on my chest.
meanings.sent5: The disquieting feeling of being watched lingered long after she left the room.

meanings.sent1: The disquieting movie kept me on edge the entire time.
meanings.sent2: The disquieting sight of the abandoned building sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent3: Her disquieting painting of a twisted tree made me question my taste in art.
meanings.sent4: The disquieting realization that I was lost in the maze struck me like a bolt of lightning.
meanings.sent5: The disquieting sound of footsteps behind me made me quicken my pace.
